en: Outdoor canteen of the National League for Woman's Service, Chalons-Sur-Marne, France

Outdoor canteen of the National League for Woman's Service. The watercooler has the business logo of Crystal Springs in the Catskill Mountains. Soldiers eat at outdoor tables under tents, served by women of the National League for Woman's Service. A notation on the back of the photograph places the location as Chalons-Sur-Marne ARC Canteen, France.
Era 7 - The Emergence of Modern America (1890-1930)
